bug.summary: Commands don't properly show 'help' when no argument given
bug.description:
for the base command datmo the following error occurs instead of showing the help function
<denchmark-code>(py35) Shabazs-MacBook-Pro:datmo Shabaz$ datmo An exception occurred: 'BaseCommand' object has no attribute 'datmo' </denchmark-code>
for snapshot, task, environment, and session commands, even the 'help' commands are showing "ProjectNotInitialized". That should only happen once the commands are executed but the user should still be able to see the help
